name: Ecommerce MERN
desc: A full-stack e-commerce application built with the MERN stack, featuring JWT authentication, product management, and real-time cart updates.

name: Ticket Management System
desc: A full-stack ticket management system built with the MERN stack, featuring ticket creation, assignment, status tracking, and an admin dashboard.

name: VBR Fabrication
desc: A ReactJS-based website for VBR Fabrication showcasing services, portfolio, and contact features with a clean, responsive design.

name: API CRUD
desc: A simple CRUD application built with ReactJS and JSON Server, allowing users to create, read, update, and delete data.
